    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Backstabber](/Feats.aspx?ID=6258) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 186 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=239)

**Prerequisites**
[Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6257)

</column>

---

You excel at quickly dispatching your foes. When you Strike an [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) foe with a weapon that has the [backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=544) weapon trait, you deal 2 extra precision damage instead of 1. If the weapon is a _+3 weapon_, you deal 4 extra precision damage instead of 2.
name: Expert Backstabber
